text: Gursahibjit Singh (born 5 February 1999) is an Indian field hockey player who plays as a forward for the national team. Six months after representing India Under-21 at the 2018 Sultan of Johor Cup, he made his senior team debut at the 2019 Sultan Azlan Shah Cup. ==References== ==External links== *Player profile at Hockey India Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Indian male field hockey players Category:Field hockey players from Punjab, India Category:People from Gurdaspur district
title: Gursahibjit Singh
